languages.text: Until the end of combat, the Warrior cannot use Charge, and their MP are reduced by −3.

traits.locale_text: Until the end of combat, the Warrior cannot use Charge, and their MP are reduced by −3.

languages.text: Until the end of combat, the Warrior cannot use {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Charge{/g}, and their MP are reduced by −3.

traits.locale_text: Until the end of combat, the Warrior cannot use Charge, and their MP are reduced by −3.

languages.text: До конца боя воин не может совершать {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Рывок{/g}, а количество его ОП уменьшается на 3.
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, the Warrior cannot use {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Charge{/g}, and their MP are reduced by −3.

traits.locale_text: До конца боя воин не может совершать {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Рывок{/g}, а количество его ОП уменьшается на 3.

languages.text: Bis zum Ende des Kampfes kann der Krieger {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Ansturm{/g} nicht nutzen, und seine BP sind um −3 reduziert.
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, the Warrior cannot use {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Charge{/g}, and their MP are reduced by −3.

traits.locale_text: Bis zum Ende des Kampfes kann der Krieger Ansturm nicht nutzen, und seine BP sind um −3 reduziert.

languages.text: Jusqu'à la fin du combat, le guerrier ne peut pas utiliser {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Charge{/g} et ses PD sont réduits de −3.
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, the Warrior cannot use {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Charge{/g}, and their MP are reduced by −3.

traits.locale_text: Jusqu'à la fin du combat, le guerrier ne peut pas utiliser Charge et ses PD sont réduits de −3.

languages.text: 直到战斗结束，战士无法再使用{g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}英勇冲锋{/g}，而且移动点数降低3点。
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, the Warrior cannot use {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Charge{/g}, and their MP are reduced by −3.

traits.locale_text: 直到战斗结束，战士无法再使用英勇冲锋，而且移动点数降低3点。

languages.text: Hasta el final del combate, el guerrero no puede usar {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Carga{/g} y sus PM se reducen en −3.
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, the Warrior cannot use {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Charge{/g}, and their MP are reduced by −3.

traits.locale_text: Hasta el final del combate, el guerrero no puede usar Carga y sus PM se reducen en −3.

languages.text: 戦闘終了まで、ファイターは突撃を使用できず、MPが−3減少する。
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, the Warrior cannot use Charge, and their MP are reduced by −3.

traits.locale_text: 戦闘終了まで、ファイターは突撃を使用できず、MPが−3減少する。

languages.text: Savaşçı, {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Hücum{/g} kabiliyetini kullanamaz ve HP'si 3 puan azalır. Bu etkiler, çatışma sonuna dek sürer.
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, the Warrior cannot use {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Charge{/g}, and their MP are reduced by −3.

traits.locale_text: Savaşçı, Hücum kabiliyetini kullanamaz ve HP'si 3 puan azalır. Bu etkiler, çatışma sonuna dek sürer.
